articles.title: Asian Paints CEO says doubtful if competition could even get ₹5,000 crore sales in three years - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Asian Paints MD & CEO mentioned that volume growth for December stood between 8% and 9%, adding that he is confident of double-digit volume growth for the company in the March quarter as well.

articles.title: LTIMindtree shares fall 12%, the most in three years — Here's why - CNBCTV18
articles.description: LTIMindtree Share Price | The stock is down over 11%, its highest since March 2020. The company's Rupee revenue and net profit were in-line with expectations, while EBIT margin of 15.4% was lower than estimates of 15.7%.
